changeSet.comment: Populate default data for MARC authority specification

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for undefinedField rule

column.name: description
column.value: Field is not defined but exists in a record

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for deprecatedField rule

column.name: description
column.value: Field is deprecated but exists in a record

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for nonRepeatableField rule

column.name: description
column.value: Field is non-repeatable but exists more than once in a record

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for missingField rule

column.name: description
column.value: Field is required but does not exist in a record

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for invalidFieldValue rule

column.name: description
column.value: Field is flat and contains an invalid value

changeSet.author: viacheslav_poliakov
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for invalidFieldTag rule

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for invalidIndicator rule

column.name: description
column.value: Field contains specified indicators and codes but with invalid indicator in the record

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for undefinedSubfield rule

column.name: description
column.value: Subfield is not defined but exists in a record's field

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for deprecatedSubfield rule

column.name: description
column.value: Subfield is deprecated but exists in a record's field

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for nonRepeatableSubfield rule

column.name: description
column.value: Subfield is non-repeatable but exists more than once in a record's field

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for missingSubfield rule

column.name: description
column.value: Subfield is required but does not exist in a record's field

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for invalidSubfieldValue rule

column.name: description
column.value: Subfield value is not valid based on subfield definition

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for nonRepeatable1XXField rule

column.name: description
column.value: More than one field from the 1XX group exists in a record

changeSet.author: pavlo_smahin
changeSet.comment: Populate default data for nonRepeatableRequired1XXField rule

column.name: description
column.value: Exactly one field from the 1XX group exists in a record
